sys_variable_value.value:
Your Archive PGS Request form has been submitted for approval. Approval must be obtained from the Project Manager, Country Manager (equivalent or higher) and, Governance, Risk, Assurance and Compliance Process Lead.
 
On approval or rejection of this request, you will receive a notification.
 
Click ‍here‍ to view the full Archive PGS Request submission.
 
 
Thanks,
TGS team

sys_variable_value.value:
Your Archive PGS Request form has been submitted for approval. Approval must be obtained from the Project Manager, Country Manager (equivalent or higher) and, Governance, Risk, Assurance and Compliance Process Lead.
 
On approval or rejection of this request, you will receive a notification.
 
Click ‍here‍ to view the full Archive PGS Request submission.
 
 
Thanks,
TGS team
